channel.title: Into the Moss
channel.description: A sunken raft of weeds woven into a verdant morass of sound, song and story. Broadcast on London's Resonance FM every Thursday, Into the Moss is a 14 minute drift through original music, soundscapes and liminal yarns.
channel.itunes:author: Into the Moss

itunes:owner.itunes:name: James Baxter, James Ferris, Ben Polhill

item.title: Sprouts
item.description: Faces from the ice, promising the past again, sprouting and awake.

item.title: Tractor
item.description: It's disappointing, if the critics don't listen, when my engine revs.

item.title: Spoilsports
item.description: Freed from ancestry, I thought the clocks had gone back. Horology, eeuch!

item.title: Augur
item.description: Forgetness spins dizzy water memories, jumping in the stream.

item.title: Solace
item.description: A cowboy had hold of a barrel, a cowboy had hold of a ball.

item.title: Bracelet
item.description: Do not talk to me, when you see me in the street. I'm with my mummy.

item.title: Constitution
item.description: In freezing bleakness I call out to myself, twice. Amidst sweet dog-song.

item.title: Pustule
item.description: Picture every day as your last day to dress up (for eternity).

item.title: Pesto
item.description: Pesto Pasta Guy is luckily unaware of cosmic fist-bumps.

item.title: Pout
item.description: For years rusted shut, a heart left out in the rain balances the scales.

item.title: Turn
item.description: In the chase of night, motel knuckles knock too late: dawn's buried itself.

item.title: Folio
item.description: Permitted to leave, circumambulation stirs ambivalent ways.

item.title: Pinpricks
item.description: What you do not know lies somewhere on the inside. Open up and see.

item.title: Skywards
item.description: Roots rooting seasons. Body sacks sup the coffee. The stroganoff blues.

item.title: Flasks
item.description: Dive into the folds, annihilation awaits Prig floating in the pool.

item.title: Vertiginous
item.description: Rise from shore to sky, evaporated opera. Dissolve in water.

item.title: Noble
item.description: A door-whisperer, hiding the resident truth, praise for the shut door.

item.title: Recreation
item.description: Emerald gardens tilt towards the dying sun, as visitors fall.

item.title: Troglodytes
item.description: Fingers guide this one, digits point with urgency. Idiot for sale.

item.title: Drooling
item.description: Smashed into living. Empty my bags, architects! Get out of the house!

item.title: ClichÃ©
item.description: Support systems down, mum and dad are orphans now. Sob amongst yourself.

item.title: Gels
item.description: Resolute harness. Familial bonds transplant hair. Daughter risen high.

item.title: Woodlands
item.description: Inheritance chokes, released like flatulent guests. Regret at all cost.

item.title: Within
item.description: Homes built for shelter; technologies buried low. She swallowed a cat.

item.title: Milked
item.description: Brawling figures judge, fear fearing a fearful drug. All symbols deranged.

item.title: Spider
item.description: Nowâs the spiderâs turn: A facile reduction, up the chelicerae.

item.title: Binder
item.description: The village hall waits, all the while nothing happens. There is so much pain.

item.title: Fly
item.description: Web-bound surveillance, karmic cycle's swift return, silk-spinner draws near.

item.title: Butcher
item.description: Definitely, the Pencilmanâs virility. Certainly it is.

item.title: Obsidian
item.description: With Obsidian, fault's with the candidate, or there's no fault at all.

item.title: Etiquette
item.description: Bouncing room to room, I crack the frigid coffin, play the circus post.

item.title: Sidekick
item.description: Yes, I've said some things. Lord knows what they could have been. The fruit of my hat?

item.title: Linen
item.description: Carefully, I stacked teetering paper towers on the dead staircase.

item.title: Exciting
item.description: Alchemical balls: swearingâs not big or clever, even in your head.

item.title: Rose
item.description: The red-flag woman, tweed-sleeved arm outstretched, spraying: "dogs are mist's princes".

item.title: Lemons
item.description: Car-to-car living. Lemonade fever dreams fail. Give back my money.

item.title: Plough
item.description: Dark across the brow, the fields are met by fingers scratching in the dirt.

item.title: Fundraiser
item.description: The world went to pot, because you did not donate to the fundraiser.

item.title: Dips
item.description: Pulped sardines on bread, shelter for the yuppie bones, huddled in the hall.

item.title: Flogged
item.description: The decks creak with a litany of transgressions. Judgement mans the helm.

item.title: Backwash
item.description: Worlds as yet untapped, backwash over this charcoal (quantum forest sketch).

item.title: Nightingale
item.description: See the Nightingale whirr to where the air is thin. Wait for what will be.

item.title: Gallows
item.description: Don't give me all that "la-di-da-di-da", I'm sick of people like you.

item.title: Tents
item.description: Retching, I'm pulled back to the frozen underpass, animals snorting.

item.title: BÃ©chamel
item.description: Voices from the past scatter through the open door, that you left ajar.

item.title: Stilts
item.description: Listen to the sound of stilts tottering across the banquet table.

item.title: Tapping
item.description: Eyes play on pages, photos in the unlit hall. Fell asleep again.

item.title: Switches
item.description: Bulging bloodshot eyes, born too soon to be shuttered. A throng congregates.

item.title: Tumble
item.description: Silent aftermath of cats nurtured by insects. The dust of ages.

item.title: Origami
item.description: Engaged Listening Skills For Workplace Efficiency: It's a fragile snare.

item.title: Bloodshot
item.description: Ignore the voices and listen to the morning. Give another chance.

item.title: Lacteal
item.description: In coveted chair, microdosing ethanol, salad haunts me still.

item.title: Nonsense
item.description: O hungry hunter, climb the stairs of the taste buds, and eat the city!

item.title: Infatigable
item.description: Dad's breathy whistle Mists the cool chrome trim of the Austin A40.

item.title: Chris
item.description: Chris, a name mispissed, eliciting unconcern from authority.

item.title: Instruments
item.description: Time is a phantom, unmasked in the final chime, as nothing at all.

item.title: Seedlings
item.description: Impenetrable street of limitless bakers, bread on top of bread.

item.title: Triassic
item.description: Colour comes to bear, On the things that we have lost, Naked in wonder.

item.title: Cherry
item.description: Unveiled hues observed. Francesca's work reassigned. Truth seen in strange light.

item.title: Spectacle
item.description: Canvas visions bloom, chaos amidst the tableaux, the gallery creaks.

item.title: Pigeon
item.description: Telephone dial up audiobook with fragments by Brittney Fleming

item.title: Convalescent
item.description: Boxes and grey chairs. Silent faces, piled up limbs. Thursday's grim demise.

item.title: Conjuror
item.description: At wakingâs threshold, lifted by the breathing land, cell-bound dreams take flight.

item.title: Ouchy
item.description: Hospital preaching, shadows gulping down root beer, rolling on and on.

item.title: Menu
item.description: Mysteries converge, Whimsy and truth intertwine, Brownies in the depths.

item.title: Team
item.description: Itâs easy to be the best version of yourself with Into the Moss.

item.title: Gaps
item.description: The speed of a dream; bridge of broken umbrellas dogs the miracle.

item.title: Pearlescent
item.description: Pearlescent eye patch drifting on ahead to rest. Dinosaur ink drips.

item.title: Gurgletops
item.description: Dolo Uldolsted, gathered in his own netting: Sea of tatami.

item.title: Content
item.description: All _____ things to come. All _____ things to come, welcome. All _____ things to come.

item.title: Trough
item.description: Trough peak trough peak trough, peak trough peak trough peak trough peak, trough peak trough peak trough.

item.title: Droves
item.description: Behind sludge grey drapes, I'm a little lady leaking refrigerant.

item.title: Thirteen
item.description: Stav opens the book. Wait, what? No one knows that book! Mike closes the book.

item.title: Endless
item.description: Subtle hums of distant flight, melodic murmurs weave through scattered notes, Rippling streams entwine with cosmic breezes, crafting celestial songs, Endless chords converge, the universe sighs in serene rapture.

item.title: Copplestone
item.description: A bishop got brained. His bones lay at the crossroad. A passage through time.

item.title: Eotogram
item.description: The Eotogram sat frail in my sister's grasp. I held it better.

item.title: Gum
item.description: Floodlit streets converge, embracing only matter. Bonds form in turmoil.

item.title: Gone
item.description: Quiescent within, error and delusion gone. Now burst into flames.

item.title: Walnut
item.description: Lost shells, Broadway dreams. Cracked hearts yearning in the crowd, echoes in the wash.

item.title: Sinew
item.description: Do not ride gently over that sheer precipice; squeal like a piglet.

item.title: Oubliette
item.description: Cars pan to the sea. No sound of chuckling allowed. Load up the washer.

item.title: Lilt
item.description: Languid jet pack dreams. Men screaming at men again, passing verbal gas.

item.title: Lens
item.description: Across the water, as the Mini Milks are mulched; is that brother's boat?

item.title: Yolked
item.description: Dad yolked in a box. The dehumidifier prepares the repast.

item.title: Ornamented
item.description: S.M.U.R.F.: Horribly tattooed on the floating mantelpiece.

item.title: Carbolic
item.description: Dragged out of a ditch by the conscious yellow drip. Pass the carbolic.

item.title: Spumes
item.description: A coach on the earth, a horse braying in the sky. Rise the sewer man.

item.title: Restless
item.description: Crisp tread on powder. Hail the falling of the clouds. Brass band requiem.

item.title: Muntjacs
item.description: A stink lingers on, as muntjacs pause to draw blood. Spring waits for the kill.

item.title: Husband
item.description: A dress rehearsal. Antique shop howls of the past. Omelette bathed in tea.

item.title: Echo
item.description: A life's brief passage. The background becomes foreground. Let the purring rest.

item.title: Dormant
item.description: Mouthing dormant hams, Todd's foot circles awkwardly. Trains tunnel through veins.

item.title: Porsche
item.description: Chalk rains down on cars. So the blindfold is unpacked. The conveyor belt...

item.title: Supernova
item.description: The non-existent. Head in a supernova. Apoplectic sighs.

item.title: Tastebud
item.description: Better read quickly; when matches wink at paper, the flames will catch on.

item.title: Broil
item.description: The quill bobs gaily in the inkwell's rancid swill. It draws in sleep's curls.

item.title: Kippers
item.description: In a world of slops, bread drips from the mezzanine. A lift helps you fall.

item.title: Slender
item.description: No one is safe from the retro-fining tough love, or jellied meltdowns.

item.title: Andromeda
item.description: A wolf roams inside, leeching away the goodness, while Tansin awaits.

item.title: Reaper
item.description: Mother stands fast, watching the colours smear down the bib of concrete.

item.title: Inertia
item.description: A slippy wry pig, resting on a butcher's lip, senses the day's up.

item.title: Inched
item.description: The pilot lightâs out. Ocean spray from a dark glow. Emulsion deceit.

item.title: Fixtures
item.description: Rabbit on a leash, racing the inquisitive on the cold wet floor.

item.title: Streamy
item.description: Awash with rhythms, syllables thrown out of sight. Noise hums from afar.

item.title: Jelly
item.description: Falling through the hatch into a jellied moment, laughter girds the crowd.

item.title: Shivers
item.description: Donahue messed up his appointment in Utah. But heâs some damp notes.

item.title: Chalked
item.description: Factory princes chalk up your doorstep while you sleep. It's just a frog cult.

item.title: Paperwork
item.description: Go into the sea and read out the lab's results. You will get a bun.

item.title: Locked
item.description: The awe is floors high, picture booths in the carpark, basement of glory.

item.title: Leggings
item.description: Elephant whiskers, all lonely in the drizzle. Snow-prints through danger.

item.title: Jagger
item.description: Leafy green's the cure, now the soundstage is empty, marbles roll away.

item.title: Chalk
item.description: Meagre flakes of snow flit by the foul mountain's feet, looking for long sleeves.

item.title: Body
item.description: Hollow limb's missing. âJust one more bloat of the lungs? Just one more breath please!â

item.title: Gaijin
item.description: From seismic bubbles, the vassalâs vapour-weight hangs. Entombed in his hide.

item.title: Hallway
item.description: Relentless chirping. Spared from echoes resounding, I'm in the hallway.

item.title: Pledge
item.description: Nihilist checklist. Absence is ever-present, skimming over planes.

item.title: Mister
item.description: Murmurs drift along bad apples' still white blossom. The season's seam frays.

item.title: Mumbles
item.description: Chubby was the nest, before the pot-bellied swift deftly migrated.

item.title: Complete
item.description: Dogs return transformed, this time into dogs again. As a dog clocks in.

item.title: Quarry
item.description: Floating on fireâs heat, calm breath opens a latched door. Blood and thunder stilled.

item.title: Nucleation
item.description: The restaurant is hot, cooking up endless repeats. Crumbs garnish footprints.

item.title: Minced
item.description: Appliances wait, electricity building orgasmic power.

item.title: Desert
item.description: In a crowded copse, gargling on raw, teething gums, hidden troubles spread.

item.title: Spooning
item.description: Velociraptor, spooning the life thatâs ebbing. Things come together.

item.title: Flutter
item.description: Back to the brunt and borne into time, empty's the mirror shorn of shine.

item.title: Chamber
item.description: Mr Pumpy Pants, all hot air and blue water. A vole clots the mind.

item.title: Birthday
item.description: Itâs ceiling salad, down in Loftieâs basement barn. Hear the igloos bray.

item.title: Fluoro
item.description: In the spasms of the unrolling god-tongue, he seethes incandescent.

item.title: Leafing
item.description: Greased by underlings, his head rests under the rock of experience.

item.title: Iceberg
item.description: Adrift in the tank, lightning strikes the peloton. It's mostly Noah's fault.

item.title: Vassals
item.description: On second viewing, the vassals talk to no one. No Phil, no Kirstie.

item.title: Sleigh
item.description: My ring is silent, like the boo of a shy ghoul, politely creeping.

item.title: Fingers
item.description: Regeneration yields a boilerâs apprentice: Your bodyâs intern.

item.title: Defalcated
item.description: Deflated hearts sink, on behalf of the others. Roaming in dog shows.

item.title: Rising
item.description: Averse to rising, beached on a dirty bone pile, nagging obliquely

item.title: Velux
item.description: The Bladder's a song; The Bladder is big and strong; The Bladder holds piss.

item.title: Eastward
Scalpel
item.description: Ghouls in the theatre boil kraken tendrils in soup. Spotlit by Johnny.

item.title: Wheel
item.description: Carrot on a stick, dust admits the same defeat. The shadowcart rolls.

item.title: Knotted
item.description: His face a wafer, fossilised into a trench, like a cataract

item.title: Candles
item.description: Wrappers in car seats. Trampolines stilled by absence. The writer retreats.

item.title: Company
item.description: Scratched in the bedrock, the tuppence of perception takes vertical tea.

item.title: Toed
item.description: There on the shore side, pulling it apart in full, to no longer know.

item.title: Daffodil
item.description: The body escapes, wrestling around the edges, seeking cessation.

item.title: Mango
item.description: Unplugged at the wall, he took himself prisoner (despite the whitebait).

item.title: Listless
item.description: New names for old rope, you are woven into walls. Whistle to the worms!

item.title: Letter
item.description: Trawling the past for escape routes in the doubled vision of the peripheral mirrored cabinet - whoâs the toy in all this?

item.title: Dinner
item.description: Horse in hand under an eggless sky, stormy rags drown in buckets within the dry spoonâs eye.

item.title: Bristles
item.description: From the doghouse to the bookhouse, leads are followed to the listening booth where some light may be shed on the mysterious Flamma Simia.

item.title: Appraisal
item.description: Sliding or surfing, mutt or intern, riding clouds of sound; itâs appraisal time!

item.title: Jokers
item.description: Mr Kit Eraser was never going to be a superman, whatever promises coated his slick tongue on the trip to watch Mr Porky talking to his pies again.

item.title: Prosthetic
item.description: Puzzling at the brownpatch in the coachpark, the glasseyed guardian of a goosy rubric heralds a jaundiced flashflood of consciousness, before ducking out. The sackblood sings within the mosquito pup, supping at a babycino.

item.title: Humming
item.description: Masked as a rat infestation at Fitson's, a perpetual loop streams sideways, sifting through sands and punching brains, only to bear cheese-witness to Miriam's sludgy tortoise pipe-dream.

item.title: Caesar
item.description: From the water on the brain to the rubble on the plate, culinary rogues wield hateful spoons with gritted teeth, lives are ruined, the sun's retired and the hills can't get over themselves. Just another day in the lab.

item.title: Orange
item.description: At an important ingress, ingesting books, people and light, the underground library forgets its overground pretensions.

item.title: Reckoning
item.description: Rousseau and Marengo Part 4: What goes in must then come out. What OTIS lifts it must let fall. Short-changed, enflamed and fading out, the question darks the mouths of all.

item.title: Revelation
item.description: Rousseau and Marengo Part 3: The way the gravy trickles at the feast of fools cannot swamp the fact that OTIS sets the rules.

item.title: Pie
item.description: Intermission: Whether Marco, Yarrow or Charlton Athletic graft him a future, thereâs a largish crowd waiting to cheer at the resulting hachÃ©.

item.title: Evolution
item.description: Rousseau and Marengo Part 2: When a fall guy fronts, it's not long before an affront is felt. Duplicity dials, but who will answer?

item.title: Genesis
item.description: Rousseau and Marengo Part 1: Bon mots, or not, garbled from the gables. What fool would rise to meet the demands of Fantoft?

item.title: Alfalfa
item.description: Rumination 30: Meat is muddier on the grassier climbs, yet climbing is cruddier to the meatier minds.

item.title: Palace
item.description: On a train-ride through the nervous system, packed among badges, badgers and bandages, Mrs Blandings sits aimlessly astride a listless chestnut mare.

item.title: Maracas
item.description: A survivalist makes some internal adjustments. Partners in crime call it a day.

item.title: Tuna
item.description: A tap on the cubicle door heralds a problem of greater girth than that of maimed apples or a cartoon grocery threat.

item.title: Jar
item.description: What flies circle this tempting treat, shedding their inventory in the poem of empty vessels?

item.title: Gland
item.description: Bread & butter, rice & potato, lump & leg: conclude your slop around Peppin's Fair.

item.title: Bolt
item.description: Roll up for the Grabbits, and the Lump and the Leg, here consuming or consumed.

item.title: Blam
item.description: Barking in the churchyard, in a static swamp, on the trail of a cinecidal director... Action!

item.title: Succour
item.description: Unkempt pamphlets are best read standing. A tragic mission is premised on a bad Greek camel. But then everything does turn into soup.

item.title: Sweats
item.description: Weep in the wake of a Cornish steamboat; weep for a lesson well learned; weep for matched socks in a silver Mondeo; weep for a love lost to lust; and weep once more for weeping's sake.

item.title: Jelly
item.description: Dino diner in watery grave; Dream teacher pizza shame; Dazzling Dad's canon comeuppance.

item.title: Hatch
item.description: Hatches cede to grant the tortoise leafy sleep. A screenwriter clambers over a droid's husky homecoming. A big pink lousy drink is thrown into the haze.

item.title: Maundy
item.description: Tongue, teeth and mouth rest better in decay, while the living run on glucose and ice cream. And goats.

item.title: Plug
item.description: An attic nap. Words under pillow feel firmer than earth under foot. Too late to dig yourself out of your inbox. Lay down the shovel and come back into the house.

item.title: Plunge
item.description: Two angels by dust bitten; one cat, neither sat nor sitten.

item.title: Moonshine
item.description: Are we strolling into festivities or caught on the bottom of a sinister shoe? As a rejuvenated fox flexes its shape-shifting muscles, are we spiralling through its soft tissues?

item.title: Onesie
item.description: A fox is cannon fodder for a tradition served up with a bang, but who saw what and does someone else have eye-deers for this splattered heap who strayed from the skulk?

item.title: Lofty
item.description: Passages rob their wanderers. Gourds wheeze. New job at Lofties. Young lights flicker over pine.

item.title: Starfish
item.description: Manuscripts masticated into the masonry. Lucifer on the loo. Old boshers have a bash.

item.title: Potatoes
item.description: Oliver plunges into the nonchaotic, leaving Tom to drag the entire world into the black hole of his body. An everyday psycho terminates their scheming schematism and a seagull gets a stitch.

item.title: Futures
item.description: Down, drowned by the weeping crowds, where the sheep sink sodden as clouds, here, hear the story of Elvie.

item.title: Globby
item.description: There's little consolation in your poopy-pants words when the birds are an oily bag of bones.

item.title: Silts
item.description: At the Gobborn Seer Tavern, a perfect day leaves a couple crowing, while the radiance glimpsed at the end of the tunnel casts a long shadow over hope.

item.title: Pause
item.description: Sinking through the office floor, hair and posset, we find a monkey with expensive tastes.

item.title: Ganglia
item.description: A doctor ducks out of his responsibilities.

item.title: Shadow
item.description: Ancient ambition leads to an icky situation.

item.title: Encroaching
item.description: A lesson learned at the lathe-side turns us towards the unseemly world of dogs.

item.title: Stucco
item.description: Snoop on Pudsey's fate at Stucco Point. Warm yourself by a smouldering car wreck. Digest a stewy gambol. Scorn the ruminations of a Tudor wombler.

item.title: Submerged
item.description: Hear the thundering of a submerged heart. Discover the contents of Rita's crypt. Learn how to dissolve a chandelier.

item.title: Facticity
item.description: Sedated and semi-buoyant musings on consciousness from an East Anglian water park. A poet gets an amazing revelation forced upon him by his publisher. A cheese sandwich gets grilled. Librarians fight each other for fish scraps. A harvest song happens at the end.
